attributes.action: make a law regaring the administration on social networking websites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the death of Poppy Bracey I have found that groups have been created on facebook which put up edited pictures up and are creating jokes regarding the death. 

I later learnt that this seems to happen when ever something like this happens.

I would like you to help by maybe making it neccessary to have all groups on social networking sites get passed by a website administrator aswell as any images on it.

The groups not only cause grief for the family but also friends.

It is disgraceful and I hope that I can count on you to get something done about it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
